report.title: View Data
report.description: Report to display the map on the View Data page on Earthworm Watch. Shows full precision.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN cache_occurrences co on co.sample_id=s.id JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.id = #survey_id# and su.deleted=false JOIN websites w on w.id=su.website_id and w.deleted=false WHERE #website_filter# AND s.deleted=false

param.name: survey_id
param.description: ID of the survey to show data for.
